<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Fix script to add default Performance Analytics Security Center user if default System Administrator user is missing. This will ensure that [PA AppSec] jobs will not fail.</description>
        <name>Add missing user for [PA AppSec] job</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[//Confirm if PA Job has a valid user

//Get all [PA AppSec] jobs
var pajob_gr = new GlideRecordSecure('sysauto_pa');
pajob_gr.addQuery('name','CONTAINS','[PA AppSec]');
pajob_gr.query();

while(pajob_gr.next()) {
		pajob_gr.run_as = getPASecUserId();
		pajob_gr.update();
	
}
execute_PAJob(); // Execute PA Job after Plugin Activation/Upgrade

function execute_PAJob(){
	var run = new GlideRecord('sysauto_script');
	run.get('name', '[AppSec] Daily Data Management');
	if (typeof SncTriggerSynchronizer != 'undefined'){
   		SncTriggerSynchronizer.executeNow(run);
   	}
}

function getPASecUserId() {
	var user_id = '';
	var secureRandom = GlideSecureRandomUtil;
	var NewPwd = secureRandom.getSecureRandomString(16);
	var user_gr = new GlideRecordSecure('sys_user');
	if(!user_gr.get('user_name', 'instance.sec.user')){
	user_gr.initialize();
	user_gr.first_name = "Performance Analytics";
	user_gr.last_name = "Security Center User";
	user_gr.user_name = "instance.sec.user";
	user_gr.locked_out = "false";
	user_gr.active = "true";
	user_gr.web_service_access_only = "true";
	user_gr.user_password = NewPwd;
	user_gr.password_needs_reset = "true";
	user_gr.insert();
	user_id = user_gr.getValue('sys_id');
	}else{
		user_id = user_gr.sys_id;
	}	

	return user_id;
}
]]></script>
